phrases: Board: Zange-chan Original CD Debut!!
TL-Note: In Buddhism, 49 days is the time it takes for a soul to reborn again into a new life.
Hey, darling.
The girl that ran away from home, how long is she going to stay here?
Let us wait and see for the time being.
She said she is Obaa-chan's friend.
How are you feeling?
Are you able to go home?
Shall I help you make a call?
Your family must be worried about you.
I am ashamed...
I cannot believe...
I have been walking a tightrope all this while.
I cannot believe...
I have always taken for granted that he will take care of me...
I cannot say that...
You can think about it after you have calmed down.
Let us go to the living room.
We have cake.
Shall I pour some tea for you?
She left?
Why?
Hey...
Have you gone to look for her?
I could not find her.
Eh?
You could not?
Have you gone to the police?
Just forget about it.
What do you mean, forget about it?
Jin!
It is none of your business.
Hey, whatever happened to Nagi-sama?
You mean...?
Looks like she is absent again today.
Yesterday, Mikuriya was acting strange too.
Do you know what happened?
I think it is better if you ask Jin directly...
Even I know how to read the atmosphere.
That is why I am asking you.
You are Mikuriya's guardian, right?
Guardian?
That is not...
I do not really know...
I do not think you need to worry so much, do you?
Look, Nagi-san might be throwing a tantrum, just like last time.
Last time?
Oh, you mean the closet incident?
I am sure something like that must have happened again.
She will be back in no time.
You think so?
Well, it is concerning the two of them, so I do not think we need to butt in.
I see, they are siblings after all.
This is where we should not be stepping in, eh?
Is love a calamity?, I asked out of the blue.
A calamity, indeed., replied the teacher in the same serious tone.
Why?
I will know why in time to come.
No, you already knew.
Has not your heart been in motion because of love, ever since ages ago?
I tried searching my heart.
But it was emptier than I expected.
Okay, that will be enough.
At this point, Nou-sensei unexpectedly showed strong emotions in response to my questions.
This can be forgiven in view of Sensei's past, which will be described later.
This has nothing to do with you, right?
Mikuriya!
What is wrong?
Are you hungry or something?
I am fine!
Do not push yourself too hard, Mikuriya.
This is not the time to be spacing out.
You have to look for Nagi-san.
I did.
Hey, what did you do to Nagi-san?
A little squabble.
That is all?
She left on her own volition.
I have no right to stop her at this point in time.
She does not have any reason to stay in my house too.
If she cannot stand being around any longer, she will just need to go somewhere else.
Huh?
What nonsense are you saying?
Is not it obvious that she cannot come back because she does not want to give in to you?
She has nowhere else to go besides your house!
She said you are her family.
Normally, nobody would say such a thing!
What she meant was that you are important to her!
She wants you to go after her!
She must be wanting to go home now!
Anyway, I have thought too highly of you.
So this is how little she meant to you.
Do not you think you are too unfeeling?
You actually want her to come back, do not you?
But you do not dare to face her, right?
That is why you are only running away, are not you?!
Nagi-san said this before.
When in doubt, act according to your intuition and emotion.
Gosh, why is this child so oblivious to his own feelings?
Jin.
What is the matter?
Jin?
Everyone has posted that they have seen her.
It seems that she is walking around town now.
Really?
Why does everyone...
Nagi-san's famous around here, you know.
Information will come flying in whenever she goes out.
You cannot check because you do not have a computer at home, right?
Be grateful!
Thank you, Tsugumi!
Listen up.
The newest info we have now is...
She claims to be a god, yet nothing is known about her...
It is a wonder how you could have lived with something like that for so long.
That is because...
That is because it is been fun!
Everyday was fun!
Nagi!
Nagi...
What do you mean, you were lying to me?
You did not mean to lie, am I right?
You do not even understand yourself, right?
You do not know about the impurities, or why you have memory lapses!
You do not know anything, and you tried to keep it from me.
Because you do not know anything and you are afraid.
But who cares about all those?
I believe that you are a god!
Even if you cannot remember, I have met you before when I was a child!
I have come so far because I hold those memories close to my heart.
I think I am...
But I cannot substantiate it!
My sense of self that is supporting me is lacking!
Ambiguous?
Inadequate?
I do not know!
What is this... fragile sense of self?
Yet I had the cheek to maintain my pride for so long...
That is why we should look for it.
I will be seeing you even if you go into memory lapses.
Together, we can find the answer.
Let us look for it together, Nagi!
Let us find the true because of your uneasiness!
Here.
Wipe your nose.
I am ashamed...
Thank goodness.
I see that you found your family.
Shige.
Oh my!
You are...
What strange fate!
I can tell you more if you wish.
How about it?
That road was where the portable Shinto shrine passed through.
It is around the place where the apartments were built.
Can you remember, Kannagi-sama?
On both sides were our field.
During spring, the field of rape blossoms was a sight to behold.
Next to it was a field of Chinese milk vetches.
Those were hard times.
My husband went to war; my children and I were left behind.
Oh, that is right.
It was I who hung myself.
I heard that my husband died in battle in the southern countries.
That made me lose myself.
I already had children, and yet...
Back then, there were many people like that.
But the land deity here could not allow anyone to throw their lives away.
I tied a rope to that tree, but the branch broke.
Even though its thickness was such that it should not have.
I have always believed that you were watching over me.
I was really happy that you came for me.
I was relieved.
That has to be the second time I saw you.
The first time was when I was born.
You are the chime that signals life, and death.
I have always had the feeling that I can meet you at the entrance and exit of the stage of life.
I plan to take things at my own pace for these 49 days.
See you again on the day of departure, Kannagi-sama.
Nagi, that woman...
The first family of my followers.
The god-protector, the family of Kamimori.
That was hard to understand...
You did not understand, huh?
Jin.
Is it all right for me to call myself a god?
Shige said those things to me.
My memories are murky.
Most likely, I appeared before her when I lost my consciousness...
Such an ambiguous sense of self... I...
Everything will be fine, Nagi!
Did not you say just now that you remembered what happened in the past?
Even I do not know much about myself yet.
But I think we just have to search and ponder.
I am sure we will find some hints.
Let us rack our brains together.
Okay?
I am back.
Replaying messages.
Mikuriya!
I saw the message board!
So what on earth happened between you and Nagi-sama?
You would better tell me tomorrow!
Shino, say something too!
Do not go too far with your fights and make-ups.
Bye, Nagi-sama!
See you tomorrow!
Hello, it is me.
I will bring the videos tomorrow.
Tell Nagi-san for me, okay?
I will call again.
I will call again.
Why is my timing...
Well, I can just tell you in person tomorrow.
Anyway, tell Nagi-san-
Everyone was worried about you.
I will apologize tomorrow at school.
Yup.
At school.
Jin, I am going to take a bath.
Okay...
Umm... Jin.
Thank you.
It is nothing.
What was that?
In commemoration of my CD release,
I will hold a handshake meeting and a confession meeting.
Well then!
In commemoration of the release, I will sing a bit of the new song!
J My feelings for you are crescendo J
J ride upon the dolphins J
J and reach you J
J Sometimes I lost my way J
J And might look at other people- J
J Even if you become a beast J
J God will definitely forgive you- J
I forgot to bring a second set of clothes!
I have to get my acts together!
Can I just run and take my clothes?
Cool down, cool down!
If this goes on, I cannot look at Nagi in the face.
I am sorry!
Watch out!
Ji... Jin.
Na... Nagi.
Jin?
I heard that Nagi-san's back!
You should have called me...
I see...
Hey!
Wait, Tsugumi!
I can explain this!
Get off of me now!
What explanation?
Perverted Jin!
Perverted human!
Huh?
Why?
Why am I crying?
What are you doing, getting a free glimpse of me?!
I did not see anything.
Not the crucial parts.
Say, he will surely make fun of me if he saw these.
